articles.title: ‘World Can Trust Our Technology’: US Tech Leaders Meet Trump At White House, Laud AI Push
articles.description: Donald Trump hosted a group of tech executives at the White House and showcased research on artificial intelligence.

Donald Trump hosted a group of tech executives at the White House and showcased research on artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Trump Hints At 200-300% Tariff On Semiconductor Imports: 'Fairly Substantial Chips Coming Shortly'
articles.description: Donald Trump addressed reporters during a dinner at the White House with a rare gathering of top executives and founders from some of the world’s biggest technology companies, including Tim Cook
articles.content:
United States President Donald Trump said he would be imposing tariffs on semiconductor imports “very shortly” but spare goods from companies like Apple Inc. that have pledged to boost their US investments.

articles.title: Bhopal: MANIT Celebrates Its 66th Foundation Day; Resolves To Break Into Top 20 Technical Institutes Of India
articles.description: The Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology (MANIT) celebrated its 66th Foundation Day in the city
articles.content:
Bhopal (Madhya Pradesh): The Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology (MANIT) celebrated its 66th Foundation Day in the city on Thursday.

articles.title: Xiaohongshu Expects Profit to Triple to $3 Billion
articles.description: Xiaohongshu Technology Co. is on track to triple its profit to $3 billion this year, making progress with commercialization on the way to a potential public listing.

articles.title: Smartee and Dental Monitoring Partner to Simplify Refinement Workflows for Orthodontists
articles.description: SHANGHAI, Sept. 5, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Smartee Denti-Technology, a leading innovator in clear aligner solutions, and Dental Monitoring, the global leader in AI-powered remote monitoring for orthodontics, today announced a new integration designed to simplify and accelerate refinement workflows for orthodontists and dental professionals.
articles.content: SHANGHAI, Sept. 5, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Smartee Denti-Technology, a leading innovator in clear aligner solutions, and Dental Monitoring, the global leader in AI-powered remote monitoring for orthodontics, today announced a new integration designed to... [2330 chars]

articles.title: Trump to hosts top tech CEOs in White House, 5 Indian Americans on guest list
articles.description: The guest list features tech titans such as Bill Gates, Tim Cook, Mark Zuckerberg, and Sergey Brin. But what stands out is the strong presence of five Indian Americans, highlighting their growing dominance in global technology leadership.
articles.content: US President Donald Trump will host some of the world’s top technology leaders for an exclusive dinner at the White House on Thursday night. The gathering, initially scheduled for the Rose Garden but moved indoors due to rain, follows a meeting of th... [2615 chars]

articles.title: LingoAce Integrates Cambridge's "Power Up" to Elevate Its Premium English Live Classes for Global Learners
articles.description: SINGAPORE and NEW YORK, Sept. 5, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- LingoAce, a leading global education technology company, today announced the integration of Cambridge University Press & Assessment's internationally acclaimed English series 'Power Up' into its Premium English Live Class curriculum. The first Level 1 and Level 2 courses launched this September, designed for learners aged 5-12 who study English as a foreign language (EFL). This strategic move will provide students with a more rigorous, engaging, and outcome-driven learning experience, aligned with both global standards and real-world communication needs.
articles.content: SINGAPORE and NEW YORK, Sept. 5, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- LingoAce, a leading global education technology company, today announced the integration of Cambridge University Press & Assessment's internationally acclaimed English series "Power Up" into its P... [3450 chars]

articles.title: Pushing new frontiers in industrial automation
articles.description: Through robust technology, strategic partnerships and sustained innovation, Emerson’s Asia Pacific business has supported industrial progress in the region for six decades – with Singapore at its centre.
articles.content:
SG60 marks a shared milestone for Singapore and global automation enterprise Emerson, which established its regional headquarters in the city-state in 1965.
Since then, the company has grown in step with the nation, using Singapore as a launchpad for... [5590 chars]

articles.title: DOST Region 2 conducts two-day monitoring of Setup beneficiaries in Cagayan
articles.description: THE Department of Science and Technology (DOST) Region 2 (Cagayan Valley), under the leadership of the Regional Director Virginia Bilgera, conducted a two-day monitoring activity for Small Enterprise Technology Upgrading Program (Setup) beneficiaries in Cagayan Province on Aug. 26–27, 2025.

articles.title: Saudi health minister discusses cooperation with Syrian communications minister
articles.description: RIYADH: Saudi Health Minister Fahad Al-Jalajel met Syrian Minister of Communications and Information Technology Abdulsalam Haykal in Riyadh on Thursday. The meeting addressed ways to strengthen joint cooperation in digital health and highlighted the benefits of modern technologies in advancing the health services system. Discussions also focused on mechanisms for exchanging
articles.content:
RIYADH: In Saudi Arabia, the tradition of “sabi” — a seventh-day celebration marking the arrival of a newborn — continues to thrive, striking a balance between cultural heritage and religious practice, and the modern event industry.
